name: UnbelievaBOWL: the 2,000 year story of a quaich
name_original: UnbelievaBOWL: the 2,000 year story of a quaich
description:
Important note: the game will only work fully if you have cookies enabled. This is due to the sound files being accessible through the use of cookies, and I have no access to any data. 

A choose-your-own-adventure archaeology story with two potential paths, following the story of an object and an archaeologist.

Further information on the artefact discussed can be found at Archaeology Orkney and AOC Archaeology.
